author: Daniel J. Lizotte and Omid Madani and Russell Greiner
title: Budgeted Learning, Part II: The Na#ve-Bayes Case
venue: Department of Computing Science University of Alberta
window: from the UCI Machine Learning Repository [BM98]. These plots show cross validation error (20% of the dataset) on the mushroom and votes datasets of the different policies. Each point is an average of 50 trials where in each trial a random balanced partition of classes were made for training and validation.
